resource_data:
"<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>75383</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>40aee8f7-68b4-4425-2fb1-55f832224290#1#3</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">MS. Mester: Kálvária-oltár: Feltámadás, 1506, Esztergomi Keresztény Múzeum, a táblák egyenként körülbelül 157x79 cm, hársfa, tempera.</string>
            <string language="en">Master MS: Kálvária-altar: Rising from the dead, 1506, Christian Museum of Esztergom, panels are 157x79 cm one by one, teil, tempera.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Vorlagen-MS: Kálvária-Altar: 
Steigend von den Toten, sind 1506, christliches Museum von 
Esztergom, Panels 157x79 Zentimeter eins nach dem anderen, teil, 
tempera.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">MME. Principale : Kálvária-autel : 
Se levant des morts, 1506, musée chrétien d'Esztergom, 
panneaux sont 157x79 centimètre un, teil, tempera.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">MS Mestre: Kálvária-kálvária-altar: 
Levantando-se dos mortos, 1506, museu christian de Esztergom, 
painéis são 157x79 cm um por um, teil, tempera.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">MS Matrice: Kálvária-kálvária-altar: 
Aumentando dai morti, 1506, il museo cristiano di Esztergom, 
pannelli è 157x79 centimetro uno per uno, teil, tempera.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κύρια κράτη μέλη: Κ3αλβ3αρηα-βωμός: 
Αυξανόμενες από τους νεκρούς, 1506, χριστιανικό μουσείο 
Esztergom, οι επιτροπές είναι 157x79 εκατ. ένας-ένας, 
teil, tempera.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">MS Principal: Kálvária-altar: 
Levantándose de los muertos, 1506, museo cristiano de 
Esztergom, paneles es 157x79 centímetro uno por uno, teil, tempera.</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">Zárt szarkofág előtt a feltámadt Krisztus, körülötte az alvó őrök, mögötte tájképi háttér.</string>
            <string language="en">The risen Christ in front of closed sarcophagus, sleeping guards around him, scenic background behind him.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">szárnyasoltár,  MS Mester,  16.század,  Krisztus feltámadása,  Krisztus,  hársfa,  </string>
            <string language="en">triptychon, Master MS, 16th century, Rising of Christ, Christ, teil</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Der gestiegene Christ vor dem geschlossenen 
Sarkophag, schlafend schützt um ihn, szenischer Hintergrund 
hinter ihm.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le Christ levé devant le sarcophage fermé, dormant 
garde autour de lui, fond scénique derrière lui.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O Christ levantado na frente de sarcófago closed, 
dormindo guarda em torno dele, fundo scenic atrás dele.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il Christ aumentato davanti il sarcophagus chiuso, 
addormentato custodisce intorno lui, priorità bassa scenica dietro 
lui.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ο αυξημένος Χριστός μπροστά από την κλειστή 
Σαρκοφάγο, κοισμένος φρουρές γύρω από τον, φυσικό υπόβαθρο 
πίσω από τον.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El Cristo levantado delante del sarcófago cerrado, 
durmiendo guarda alrededor de él, fondo escénico detrás de él.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">triptychon, Vorlagen-MS, 16. Jahrhundert, Steigen von Christ, 
Christ, teil</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">triptychon, MME. principale, 16ème siècle, se lever du Christ,
le Christ, teil</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">triptychon, MS mestre, 1õ século, levantar-se de Christ, 
Christ, teil</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">triptychon, MS matrice, sedicesimo secolo, aumentare di Christ, 
Christ, teil</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">triptychon, κύρια κράτη μέλη, 16$ος αιώνας, αύξηση 
Χριστού, Χριστός, teil</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">triptychon, MS principal, décimosexto siglo, levantamiento de 
Cristo, Cristo, teil</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>

            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
